announcements.text: If there wasn't a king of bacon before, there is now. #Congratulations MJ!
I only eat dinner because I look forward to breakfast the next day. #priorities
Tallyn has been without a good breakfast for 2 days. I am calling the paramedics. #quicklynow
Why is #breakfast the #most amazing food? The world may never know. What I do #know is that eggs, sausage, and bacon make men #happy........
Most men consume protein bars after working out. I consume breakfast.
What was Andrew's first word as a child? You guessed it: #breakfast
